page.title: 11HOME LIFE (CONT)
page.content: CHILD OF 1985 (Cont,d) WE ARE ALL STIIL TALKING.SIR SAYS BE QUIET!SO WE SHUT UP.IF WE DONT WE GET SENT OUT.AND HE FORGETS ABOUT US.WE ALL GET OUR HYMN BOOKS OUT.THEN WE LINE UP AT THE DOOR TALLEST FIRST THEN THE SMALL ONES.YOU WALK DOWN THE PATH INTO THE HALL.WE GET INTO LINES READY FOR THE SERVICE.SOMETIMES WE SIT DOWN. ON A MONDAY MR.BLUNDELL TAKES US FOR A SERVICE.HE TELLS US STORYS FROM THE BIBLE.THEN WE GO BACK INTO THE CLASSROOM READY FOR MATHS.CHILDREN FROM MR.VICARYS AND MR.JONES CLASS FOR MATHS WE ALL HAVE OUR OWN SEATS.WE KEEP THE SEATS EVERY.WHEN WE HAVE FINISHED OUR MATHS WE GO OUT TO PLAY.THIS ABOUT 10.30.BEFORE WE GO OUT WE HAVE TO PASS SIRS TEST.HE COMES ROUND AND LOOKS AT OUR WORK .IF NOT HE DOES NOT LET US OUT.WHEN PLAY IS FINISHED WE COME IN.WE DO OUR COMPUTER
